sentences.en: And they strive to achieve consensus out of conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们力图在矛盾冲突中求得意见协调.

sentences.en: As far as quality is concerned, we must not make do with what we have, but must constantly strive for excellence.
sentences.cn: 在质量[品质]方面, 不能将就, 要精益求精.

sentences.en: Don't strive merely for quantity of production.
sentences.cn: 在生产中不要单纯地追求数量.

sentences.en: Few could reach such perfection but all might strive towards it.
sentences.cn: 尽管很少有人能达到如此完美的境界,但每个人都应朝着这个目标而奋斗.

sentences.en: He strives hard to keep himself very fit.
sentences.cn: 他努力使自己保持非常的健康。

sentences.en: I strive for the best, and I do the possible.
I was still striving to be successful.
Mr Annan said the region must now strive for economic development as well as peace.
sentences.cn: 安南先生说该地区现在必须为经济发展与和平而奋斗。
我何必拼死拼活要变成无色人 呢 ?

sentences.en: Strive for the best, prepare for the worst.
sentences.cn: 作最坏的打算,争取最好的结果.

sentences.en: The scientists strive for a breakthrough in cancer research.
sentences.cn: 科学家们力争在癌症研究方面有个突破.

sentences.en: They strive to retain access to the resources that make company tick.
sentences.cn: 他们设法获取公司赖以运转的资源.

sentences.en: We encourage all members to strive for the highest standards.
sentences.cn: 我们鼓励所有成员为达到最高标准而努力。

sentences.en: We must continue to strive for greater efficiency.
sentences.cn: 我们必须继续为提高效率而努力。

sentences.en: We must strive to push the national economy forward.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要把国民经济搞上去.

sentences.en: We will strive for peace in the troubled areas of the world.
sentences.cn: 我们会在世界的动乱地区致力和平.

sentences.en: You should always strive to achieve more, however well you have done before.
sentences.cn: 无论之前取得何等辉煌的成就，都应该不断努力进取。

words.tran_cn: 努力（strive的现在分词）；奋斗；力争

trans.tran_en: to make a great effort to achieve something

trans.tran_cn: 努力奋斗，力求，斗争，力争
trans.tran_en: to make a great effort to achieve something
